description: This beautiful creation from the talented Thai artisan Naree is a unique interpretation on the classic cultured freshwater white pearls necklace design. Three elegant strands of shimmering cultured freshwater white pearls are accented with a beautiful white mother of pearl shell flower, which adds an elegant floral statement to the piece. (This necklace comes in a variety of colors to choose from). This necklace measures in at 34 inches long with a 3 inches extension and is finished off with a lobster claw clasp. The perfect accessory for any occasion, this elegant necklace will look amazing with whatever you are wearing. PLEASE NOTE: The handcrafted nature of this product will produce minor differences in design, sizing and weight. Variations will occur from piece to piece, measurements may vary slightly.
Includes an original AERAVIDA organza jewelry pouch (comes in various colors), also handmade by our Artisans. Perfect for gift giving to someone special or keep for yourself!
works directly with gifted and talented Artisans from all over the world. At the core of our philosophy is fair trade and fostering a sustainable future for our Artisans.

Local artisan Naree grew up in Trang province in the southern part of Thailand. Naree's family members are merchants so she grew up learning about business and trade. She wanted to make and produce something of her own so she started learning about making jewelry and the processes. It took Naree years of practice but her skills improved and she was finally able to open her own shop in Bangkok. She loves to create beautiful handmade jewelry and is thrilled when others appreciate her designs.
